title: Fragment, ""L'Escarpolette" (The swing)", 1783–89
medium:
Medium: cotton 
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 72 x 90 cm (28 3/8 x 35 7/16 in.)
description: Pastoral figures and trophies with birds and animals. Central scene is a woman on a swing framed by two female herms. The swing is pulled by a string held by a young man. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, ""L'Escarpolette" (The swing)", 1783–89.
1783–89. Medium: cotton 
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-68.
